ygData.subject: mend bones and lesser sheilding
ygData.msgSnippet: Mend bones, never used it I have it in book, but Im 22 and never used it. Even when I was soloing the aviaks when they were red to me, this might be because I
ygData.messageBody:
Mend bones, never used it I have it in book, but Im 22 and never used it.
Even when I was soloing the aviaks when they were red to me, this might be
because I always cast untill I get my best pet though, remember bones and
mana are free your life isn't a good pet makes a difference. Bah! he is my
pet I aint wasting no mana on him during a fight and my style of play is
usualy to jump in and go some melee to so he doesnt take all the much damage.
I'm now 22 and been playing in unrest were I cant go melee to well, they
hit to hard, but your always in a group so again pet doesnt get hit to much.

My Dark Brother Im surprized you didnt guess this one you had to have
bought gate in the clerics guild. Check near the bank in mage guild, first
guy on the right he has are sheild line of spells. Remeber unlike weaker
races in Neriak we are royalty and they would not dare strike you. Walk in
there and demand that it be sold to you, hehehe bring money.

Zakrell Lu'Dan
